body_html:
I get this error when trying to run protoc :

pi@raspberrypi:/tensorflow $ ls -ali /usr/local/bin/protoc
3433 -rwxr-xr-x 1 root staff 148548 Jul 15 05:11 /usr/local/bin/protoc
pi@raspberrypi:/tensorflow $ sudo /usr/local/bin/protoc
/usr/local/bin/protoc: error while loading shared libraries: libprotobuf.so.10: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Here is a link to the terminal output text file - https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B0Oci8Q1NdEuNkRHSHNPZ2xZcW5HWTJsYUhiWkdJSVljSnlV

body:
I get this error when trying to run protoc :

pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow $ ls -ali /usr/local/bin/protoc
3433 -rwxr-xr-x 1 root staff 148548 Jul 15 05:11 /usr/local/bin/protoc
pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow $ sudo /usr/local/bin/protoc
/usr/local/bin/protoc: error while loading shared libraries: libprotobuf.so.10: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Here is a link to the terminal output text file - https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B0Oci8Q1NdEuNkRHSHNPZ2xZcW5HWTJsYUhiWkdJSVljSnlV
